p: In general, THI max is used for the sub-daily methods whereas THI d is used for the daily step methods. This methodological difference explains why there was a greater difference in the projected number of days of heat stress between the daily and sub-daily methods of calculation for the 2010s compared to the 2090s. The increased T towards the end of this century increased the number of days when THI d > THI thr, equalizing the number of days when THI max > THI thr ( Fig 4). However, even in this situation the severity of heat stress, which is taken into account only in the case of the sub-daily estimation methods, increases AML ( Fig 3).
